Trade/Device Name(s): TD-4239 Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for TD-4239 Blood Glucose Monitoring System and TD-4239 Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in whole blood samples
Indications for Use Summary: TD-4239 Blood Glucose Monitoring System: For self-testing of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the finger by people with diabetes at home; TD-4239 Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System: For professional, multiple-patient use in healthcare settings to measure glucose in capillary, venous, and neonatal whole blood samples
